talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_00>Where were you?! You disappeared on
me so suddenly. I was worried sick.
talk0020: <sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Yikes. Have I got a dumb story for you...
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>What about you?! Pay more attention!<sp:5:1:0>
I fell down a well. It was awful!

<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I would have spent the rest of my life
down there if a passing traveler hadn't
rescued me...
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>Baaah haha! Just imagine all you guys
doing that. It's just so dumb! Can't
believe I missed all that.<sp:5:0:0>
Serves me right for falling down a well.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You a new member of the research team
too, buddy? <sp:5:0:0>Me too. Look what we've
gotten ourselves into.
Hardly dressed to impress, are we? Can't
believe the first order we got was to...<sp:5:0:0>
go into the field...<sp:5:0:0>in our underpants.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Totally bizarre. They say the order came
from Princess Zelda, but...<sp:5:1:0>you've got to
wonder, uh, <sp:5:0:0>really?
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Right?<sp:5:0:0> Massive blunder.


You won't believe this either...<sp:5:0:0> Our
leader, Bougan, didn't just drop the
whole underpants thing.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration_01>He's made it a whole way of training!
Yeah, he took Drant with him and went
on a journey to master that "method."
<snd:TalkPositive>They're headed to <clr:0000>Deplian Badlands<clr:ffff> in
the <clr:0000>far north of Hyrule<clr:ffff>!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Uh, what? <sp:5:0:0>I swear I'm not slacking here.
I'm on an official break!
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Uh, what?<sp:5:0:0> I swear I'm not slacking here.
I'm on an official break.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>But yeah...<sp:5:1:0> Let's not spread it to the
other survey-team people around the
world about this, uh, <sp:5:0:0>style choice.
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_01>Baaah! Hahaha!<sp:5:1:0> Sounds bad for poor
Drant. What are they doing there?
There's NOTHING there!
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>But I guess the new roads going
from Hebra to Eldin might have some
new surprises.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>It could be interesting, I guess.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease_00>*sigh* Finally,<sp:5:0:0> I look like a real survey
team member now that I can dress in
the official uniform, but...
You see, I have a best buddy, <clr:0000>Dillie<clr:ffff>, who
I usually travel everywhere with, and he
came out here with me.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>But somewhere along the way, I lost track
of him. Well...<sp:5:1:0>I mean, I actually lost SIGHT
of the guy.
We were around <clr:0000>Rebonae Bridge <clr:ffff>when it
happened. That's near Wetland Stable,
kinda southwest of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Suddenly, just gone. If you see him,
do me a favor, huh? Tell him he's got
me worried.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Notice_01>Huh? Hold on. Aren't you...


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Yes! You're that guy from before!


<sp:0:2:2:6400>Thank you for saving me!<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>Hahaha! That whole underpants story is
going to crack me up every time.
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My buddy <clr:0000>Dillie<clr:ffff> just up and vanished on
me while we were coming out this way.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Trouble>Like, I saw him, right? And then I didn't
see him. I mean, we just got separated
somehow. Maybe.
We were around <clr:0000>Rebonae Bridge<clr:ffff> when it
happened. That's near Wetland Stable,
kinda southwest of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you see that guy, just please tell him
he's got me worried.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughL_00>Ha! That IS ridiculous.<sp:5:1:0> One more time,
so I can enjoy every stupid detail.
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now where did Dillie run off to?


We were around <clr:0000>Rebonae Bridge<clr:ffff> when he
vanished. That's near Wetland Stable,
southwest of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you bump into him somewhere, just
tell that guy I'm worried about him.
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Admiration_01>Ah!<sp:5:0:0> That IS you, isn't it!


You helped me with that underpants thing.<sp:5:0:0>
Wait, you helped Dillie here too?
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Should we try going there in just
our underpants?
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sigh_01>*sigh*<sp:5:1:0> What's a guy to do? I got into
the Zonai Survey Team recently, and
now THIS. Look at me.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sitting here. Like a dope. In my
underpants.

Thought I'd be getting in on something
good here, but my first order was to go
into the field...dressed like this.
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>They say the order came down from
none other than Princess Zelda, but...<sp:5:1:0>
I mean, what's up with that, right?
